items.titolo: OpenAI Is Nuking Its 4o Model. China’s ChatGPT Fans Aren’t OK
items.descrizione: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.

items.titolo: Google reports that state hackers from China, Russia and Iran are using Gemini in 'all stages' of attacks — phishing lures, coding and vulnerability testing get AI underpinnings from hostile actors
items.descrizione: Hackers from Russian, China, India, North Korea, and elsewhere are using Google's Gemini AI to augment their attacks, Google says. From generating phishing lures, to translating text, coding, and vulnerability testing, G

items.titolo: Il Pentagono vuole Claude senza limiti, Anthropic dice no
items.descrizione: Anthropic si oppone al Pentagono che vuole usare Claude senza restrizioni per scopi militari. A rischio il contratto da 200 milioni di dollari. The post Il Pentagono vuole Claude senza limiti, Anthropic dice no appeared
